name: KALAMANDIR - The Celluloid Chapter Art Foundation
briefDescription: Kalamandir - the Celluloid Chapter Art Foundation have been promoting , making and Marketing for traditional handicrafts of Jharkhand since last 11 years and have been successful in identifying few hundred craft persons who inspite of all odds like to continue the production of handicraft items and possess some kind of inner intensity to develop their product quality and range. We have been providing them motivation through counselling and marketing exposure besides small training program conducted mainly through our own resources. Marketing fairs sponsored by DC(H), New Delhi, NABARD, TRIFED, Dept of Industry  and Dept of Rural Dev., Govt. of Jharkhand was few efforts which were very successful.
